name: Place
desc: The component for adding a map with a specific point of interest.

items.name: latitude
items.desc: The latitude of the place’s location.

items.name: longitude
items.desc: The longitude of the place’s location.

items.name: accessibilityCaption
items.desc: The caption that describes a place. The text is used for VoiceOver for iOS, VoiceOver for iPadOS, and VoiceOver for macOS. The value in this property should describe the place for non-sighted users. If accessibilityCaption is not provided the caption value is used for VoiceOver for iOS, VoiceOver for iPadOS, and VoiceOver for macOS.

items.name: anchor
items.desc: An object that defines vertical alignment with another component.

items.name: animation
items.desc: An object that defines an animation to be applied to the component.The none value is used for conditional design elements. Adding it here has no effect.

items.name: behavior
items.desc: An object that defines behavior for a component, like Parallax or Springy.The none value is used for conditional design elements. Adding it here has no effect.

items.name: caption
items.desc: A string that describes the place depicted on the map. For example, if the latitude and longitude point to a park, the caption should contain the name of the park. The caption is displayed in the full screen version of the map, and the text is also used for VoiceOver for iOS, VoiceOver for iPadOS, and VoiceOver for macOS  if accessibilityCaption text is not provided.

items.name: conditional
items.desc: An instance or array of component properties that can be applied conditionally, and the conditions that cause them to be applied.

items.name: hidden
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the component is hidden.

items.name: identifier
items.desc: An optional unique identifier for this component. If used, this identifier must be unique across the entire document. You will need an identifier for your component if you want to anchor other components to it.

items.name: layout
items.desc: An inline ComponentLayout object that contains layout information, or a string reference to a ComponentLayout object that is defined at the top level of the document. If layout is not defined, size and position will be based on various factors, such as the device type, the length of the content, and the role of this component.

items.name: mapType
items.desc: A string that defines the type of map to display by default. Valid values:standard (default). Displays the standard map. hybrid. Displays a map with satellite imagery with standard features overlaid.satellite. Displays satellite imagery only.

items.name: span
items.desc: The object for defining the visible area of a map, relative to its center. A span is defined in deltas for latitude and longitude.

items.name: style
items.desc: An inline ComponentStyle object that defines the appearance of this component, or a string reference to a ComponentStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.The none value is used for conditional design elements. Adding it here has no effect.
